definition: the fielding position of the player on a baseball team who is expected to field balls in the right third of the outfield (looking from home plate)
details:
noun
- the fielding position of the player on a baseball team who is expected to field balls in the right third of the outfield (looking from home plate)
= synonyms: right field
- the piece of ground in the outfield on the catcher's right
= synonyms: right field
